name: VM AutoScale
description: VM AutoScale is a dynamic scaling service that automatically adjusts virtual machine (VM) resources (CPU cores and RAM) on Proxmox VE based on real-time metrics and user-defined thresholds. Supports multiple Proxmox hosts via SSH, auto-configuration of hotplug/NUMA, Gotify notifications, and billing tracking for web hosters.

notes.text: VM Requirements: Enable NUMA (VM > Hardware > Processors) and Hotplug (VM > Options > Hotplug > CPU/Memory) for live scaling
Auto-configure hotplug: Set auto_configure_hotplug: true in config.yaml to auto-enable hotplug on managed VMs
